title: When is the PBE sign up page coming back?
body:
Hey,

I was wondering when the pbe sign up page is coming back since I've been waiting for months now... I'd really like a pbe account since I want to try out new champs and skins, but I can't do that if there isn't even a sign up page. I don't want to pay 15-30 euro for a pbe account on sites (is it even legit/worth the money?) 

Anyway let's make it clear to riot that we want the sign up page back for the pbe.

replies.body: I don't have any updates on the PBE just yet, but our devs have updated the [PBE status page](http://status.pbe.leagueoflegends.com/#pbe) regarding its maintenance.  Any updates should be provided there.  Hang tight!
But can you give us how much longer like 2-4 months
I believe the sign-ups will be up later today, don't get your hopes up though.
